Name: Sounak Poddar
Title: Dumpyard
Review: Maybe once upon a time, it was a very beautiful lake but now as it has turned out to be a place where all the dumping takes place.

Name: jainms
Title: OK
Review: Not maintained well, Not an main attraction place but can visit once, pollution less as it is far from city.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: Artifical lake
Review: Its the place for nature lovers and one of the best places in Hyderabad to hangout away from pollution and chaos of the city

Name: Ashish Kumar
Title: Nice place for bird-watching, but no proper maintenance.
Review: The place is nice with different kind of birds all over, but need a lot of improvement with the waste management.A lot of plastic bottles can be seen all around with all sitting placed in damaged condition.Though a nice place to watch birds like earget, pond heron, cormorant, blue tailed bee eater, swallow, parakeet, shikra, Oriental Robin, water hen are few to be named.During entrance you'll be warned with a board "Beware of Crocodiles" but i didnn't found any in my 3 visits.

Name: Karthik Dasu
Title: An Okay place
Review: It is very decent place to visit in the city of Hyderabad.Please do visit, only in the rainy season.

Name: Amartya1987
Title: Walk a mile with the nature
Review: Let's set the right expectations. It's a reservoir with sluice gates in case water needs to be released downstream and there's a nearby park. That's it.Reaching the place is quite easy, take the APPA junction exit on ORR and come towards the himayat Sagar road. There are plenty of signage so you can't get lost enroute.There is a parking ready to accommodate around 30 -40 cars. Once you are in the place, you see 2 gates, one for the park and other for the reservoir.The reservoir doesn't close till late but the park gate closes by 5pm, so plan accordingly.The gate for the reservoir takes you on a mile of walk along the reservoir fence right up to the sluice gates and you can cross the gates and have some extra walk. The waking road is clean and picturesque. You can take a lot of nice pics. You can see a variety of birds chirping around, just be ready with your cameras to take the best shot.The park beside the reservoir also had some nice species of flowers and birds. There's a small play area for kids.Best is to walk the long distance along the reservoir and then take some rest in the park. But choice is always individual.The reservoir and parking is free, however, for the park, adults are charges 15/- per head.Coming to the food, you see a lot of bhutta(corn) sellers. Refreshing to have them in reading season.Right opposite to the place you have small refreshments points with some tea and bhajji sellers.Few of them sell fish fry, it's cheap and tastes great, non veg lovers can have a bite.

Name: Veer2468
Title: Average
Review: It is good to visit this lake on a weekend but not daily. The park beside is good but there is an entry to it. There are also parking charges.

Name: Anamika K
Title: Good for morning stroll
Review: A very good place to hangout with friends and we enjoyed a lot at Himayat Sagar..!! There is one thing that everyone to do at Himayat Sagar is swimming, a pure water and taking pictures. As well a good sight for everyone, the great moments.

Name: higghligght shiva
Title: A Normal lake side by beautiful park
Review: About Himayath sagar lakeAll are telling that on sunday public is crowd But public is not there that to on sunday. this should be not there in the tourist list  But normal 2 see for a view of lakeOnly some birds are coming like pigeon, parrot, kingfisher different types of birds.Lake is normal on left side many rocks stones r there in middle Lotus plants r there.. This park is best for Nature Lover's. Tickect is Rs5 for each person But they r taking 10Rs for each person. We r given only 5RS for each . In this park u can see many birds & beautiful flora & fauna  .Here u can see many people's,family & couple's are there. it is a small place to play for children's Many people's r prepare food at home they bring & eat  in this picnic spot.from mehdipatnam 288B & 288M or 288n Bakaram. In this park u can take nice pics over there. if people where depressed or tension they can relief here.Neatnessis very good in this park. it is a silent & peaceful for couple's.Out side of the park ghouse bhai fish stall is there. some people r coming take parcel.Many people eating there only .Once is enough to see lake.Taste is so delicious. Murrel, Rohu ,catla, Pomfret  fishes Rs 30 for 1 piece & 50 for 1 fish.

Name: koteswararao
Title: lake for drink
Review: this lake constructed for drinking for Hyderabad nearly 100 years back when over floon   to save the city

Name: pjanil1968
Title: Excellent picnic spot
Review: This place is very good for kids and families. Kids would love the place. Good for morning and evening walk. Very calm and peaceful picnic spot. Good to view sun rise. Lots of birds around kids would like the atmosphere

Name: Tirtho1911
Title: Nice calm place visited for bird watching
Review: I have visited with my friends in month of May, for the purpose of Bird watching. While we spend lot of time on Bridge, we also trekked into other side of lake in jungle area. Its a wonderful place and to our delight we have seen lot of species. Its a nice place for Morning walk, and view from Bridge during early morning hours is awesome. Bird watcher please try it out

Name: zap r
Title: Good place for a morning or evening walk.
Review: 1. This lake is quite a place to visit, especially in the morning (before 8 or evening after 5)  Sunrise and sunset view is good. 2.  This lake is quite far from the main city, takes an hr drive.3.  Free of cost.4.  Nothing much around this lake, food or shopping, can spend around 1hr here.5.  Not much of a fun place for kids too. 6.  Best time of the yr ti visit is Aug to march. ( Avoid summers, as the lake will be a bit dry. and its too hot to be around.)

Name: Uma
Title: Volunteer Visit with cycling friends
Review: A must visit place for people who are into cycling, yoga (outdoor) and running... Good timing will be early mng and evenings... Caution - You are not allowed to cross fencing.

Name: Manish K
Title: Good picnic spot
Review: Himayat Sagar Lake, along with the nearby Osman Sagar Lake, was constructed to supply water to residents of Hyderabad. Located just off the Outer Ring Road, this lake is also a good picnic spot, which is frequented by families and youngsters alike. One can take good photographs of the lake or can walk down to the dam itself. Also, parking  here is still free, unlike that at Osman Sagar.

Name: swiftydrifts
Title: For morning and evening stroll
Review: Around 20 kms from Gachibowli... is an artificial lake built prior Indian independence.This place is good for early morning walk or to stroll in the evening. Sunrise aint so prominent still worth a visit during that particular time.Not so crowded and you will find some cycling or jogging..

Name: shivaraikod
Title: Good sunset view
Review: Been here in the month of Jan 17 , the lake here is really big with good views from all around and the sun set is not to be missed out.

Name: Lav Dwivedi
Title: Good views on sun-rise and sun-set
Review: Himayat Sagar has scenic beauty around. This is a good place in Hyderabad for selfi-lovers. The fresh air and the atmosphere during the evening is really enjoyable moreover it comes on the way to airport, so is well connected. Recommend for morning and evening views.

Name: santosh2ind
Title: Himayat sagar lake
Review: This is beautiful lake in hyderabad.it was constructed by meer osmanalikhan. every one have to see this lake.

Name: kmegha911
Title: Great Place
Review: The grassy banks that embrace the lake make it an ideal picnic spot.The beautiful road on the bund of the Himayat Sagar Lake makes for an exhilarating driving experience.Feeling of Cool and Clean air near the lake was also soothing experience.

Name: Gowthamcivilion
Title: Scenic Lake View !
Review: This is one of the lake view spots in hyderabad, which is 10-15km away from hyderabad. Parking facility is available. People are not allowed to go after 6PM

Name: nagesh1955
Title: visit of river
Review: Very oldest lake developped in nizams period. This is very strong consturction made by them. The view is very good.

Name: NKReddy
Title: Weekend gateaway
Review: Perfect time to visit the lake as water levels increased . One should feel the  sunset and have good snaps

Name: Ravindra V
Title: Nice place to visit when there is water
Review: This lake is nice place to visit and walk when there is water in the lake. There is a small dam where you can walk. There is a very small park as well. Other than that nothing much. Go when the weather is good and it has rained well recently.

Name: superb114
Title: Nice
Review: Nice place to visit but there are no water and it a long drive destination and best place to visit along with friends

Name: RajibLayek
Title: Nice long drive destination but not for Tourist !!
Review: This is a nice long drive destination in the evening. We went here couple of times and spend some soothing time in the afternoon. But this is not well maintained and noting much to see as water level is very low during the year and everything is fenced.So, this is a place where you can spend 1/2 hour but this is not a ideal place for tourist !!

Name: SuvodipMoitra
Title: Good drivethrough
Review: The dam road is a beatiful evening drive through. We took diversion from ORR. Opened our windows, pleasant breeze. Very scanty water though in the sagar lake.

Name: Sreedhar R
Title: Himayat sugar lake
Review: Birla temple is the nice and cool place in hyderabad  This lake  is near to many corporate office and engineering colleges ,  there is a temple near this lake  lord venkateshwara swamy. Here I found many couples,  family,  youngsters solo people use to come for this temple for peace of mind. Whenever my mind is not cool and when am in depression mood I always prefer this temple here I will get good peace of mind and relaxation

Name: BRKanth
Title: No Water to see but great breeze
Review: Went to this place along with family and there is absolutely no water. Unless if you wanted to have some fresh air, not much to see.

Name: Sivanageswara R... B
Title: A must visit place near Hyd
Review: I recently visited this place. It will be pleasant and eye catching in the evening.A must visit place for nature lovers.Best place to spend some time with family/friends in the evening.

Name: Ravi K
Title: lovers park
Review: Its a reservoir. water supplies from here for twin city's its a good place for family or friends gathering.

Name: rkkoya
Title: Good to see
Review: Himayat Sagar Lake is just ok. It can be reached by public and private transport as well.It has no special attraction now It was well planned during the olden days with high technology.

Name: travelMakesWiser
Title: Non tourist spot
Review: This place is not meant for tourists, though you will find people loitering around trying to get a good look at the lake. A reservoir, meant for water replenishment for the city, barricaded all around with high fences. The nursery next to the lake is in state of ultimate neglect. If you are a local who has kind of done everything else in Hyderabad this may be just a casual thing to cross off you "things to do in hyderabad" bucket list.

Name: AfrozJaved
Title: A clean family destination
Review: Himayat sagar has improved a lot with cleanliness, fencing, no drive zone on the lake and so on.  The place require slightly more maintenance, like the steps to go down opposite the dam.  There used to be a garden, that can be renovated and maintained.Stray Eunuchs still come to beg, but we did not find them as aggressive as encountered in Maharashtra and trains. The walk on the adjacent road is pleasant, best time to visit would be in December January, sunsets are really good near the lake.

Name: navedsaeed
Title: Great view
Review: This place is not well maintained. Though the place has great views around and the road around the lake provides great view while driving.

Name: DRSSDASH
Title: Azam Jah Lake
Review: This lake is situated around 12 km from the city of Hyderabad and named after  Mir Himayath Alikhan(Azam Jah) on river Musi to control floods in 1927.Very popular picnic spot .

Name: sudmaha
Title: Hangout in the Evening
Review: The place is full of public and have beautiful view in the evening. a good place to hangout on weekends.

Name: SukantaDe
Title: Sunset at Himayat Sagar Lake
Review: Its one of the nice place to visit along with the family. We visited the place on 7th Oct'15, while returning from Mahakali Temple to Chevella. Two/Three boats were floating on the lake water, may be the fishermen. One small dam, also observed. We enjoyed the scenic beauty of sunset....the shadow of the red coloured lake water during sunset....Cool breeze.....Kids were enjoyed a lot.

Name: seedhunter
Title: Nice water body with cool breeze.
Review: Located on south-west side of Hyderabad, this is artificial lake and a source of drinking water for the city. A small but nice dam is also there for controlling floods. Nice spot for evening hours to feel cool breeze as well as nice sun set. During summer, there is chances you may get any water in the lake.

Name: slayer_prashanth
Title: Beautifully built over a lake
Review: The powerful breeze that takes you off your tensions and soothens your mind after a full day work. A perfect place to be in the evenings with friends, family and also alone if you prefer.

Name: MARGDARSHI
Title: Tourism Potential To Be Developed
Review: While visiting Hyderabad any visitor would be impressed with the number of lakes & gardens that have been  built here by the rulers but this is also tinged with a sense of regret that the later rulers did not  build up on this foundations & fully exploited its tourism potential.This artificial lake is 20 kms from Hyderabad & was built by the last Nizam Osman ali Khan & named it after his youngest son Himayat Ali Khan.This lake was built in 1927 drawing the waters of the tributory of Musi river parallel to the Gandipet lake to cater to the water needs of the city & also as a flood control measure.A cool pleasant breeze welcomes you & is a good picnic spot.

Name: VikashTripurari
Title: Lake with winds !!
Review: visit any time you will get either cool breeze or nice winds. though its not a very hot spot to visit but good water body and its huge.must be developed as a good attraction as natural beauty is what you get here with fresh air

Name: manan_8712
Title: Great Experience
Review: It is great service provided and nice place to visit ever. Along with other places in hyderabad. It also on way of airport from city.

Name: panks_41086
Title: good for picnic
Review: This lake is beautiful, calm & peaceful. It is good for one day picnic. It is situated in out skirts of hyderabad city.

Name: PROF.HARAGOPAL MATHSYARAJA
Title: Himayath sagar lake
Review: In the out skirts of the city, on the way to and close to the airport we can find this lake and its tank bund is well maintained. How ever, thee days we find the lake slowly drying up due to encroachments on the riverbed.Once it was a nice picnic spot  for its scenic location now needs to be developed as an attractive tourist spot by developing parks and planting trees and making the place Echo friendly.

Name: Karan K
Title: A Scenic Beauty Within a drive able Distance. . !
Review: approximately about 30 min drive distance from Hi-tech City, this Lake is a very beautiful place to have a picnic with family or friends, just the 4th exit from the Outer Ring road from Gachibowli its a very calm and peaceful place with a lot of hot spots for a very artistic background perfect for Pics !! MIND YOU - its very very difficult to find any means of transport so make sure u have your own.. also there arent any food joints anywhere around this place  so make sure u take food with you, likes - very beautiful , not a single man made structure in sight once here, not many vehicles come by here hence no pollution, dislikes - not accessible via public transport easily, no food or atm available near around

Name: A Padma
Title: go for a morning walk
Review: it it one of those for somebody who wants to explore the beautiful nature spots around hyderabad. Enjoy your morning or evening walk, also good for bird watchers. Don't forget to carry your lunch pack, snacks, a camera and a book. you can select a quiet place and enjoy the lovely scenery of the lake while reading a book.

Name: vibha123
Title: Nice view always...especially in the evening..
Review: Himayat sagar is another place I feel like driving to many a times just to see the calm waters giving people peace..soothes the eye....but lacks maintenance like many other good places in the city of nawabs...

Name: SABER_Wanderlust
Title: No Fun due to Wires
Review: This is a place which was fun till sometime back, especially  in evenings. There are huge Jaalis now put up which spoils views, devoid the place of sitting around and enjoying the sunset.

Name: KASI VENKOBA RAO
Title: Himayat Sagar Lake-Picnic spot
Review: Himayat Sagar is an artificial lake situated at distance of about 20 Kms from Hyderabad in ,India. It lies parallel to an another artificial lake  called Osman Sagar and the place is known as Gandepet.. The Himayat Sagar along with Osman Sagar was a source for water supply to Hyderabad.till recently. But due to population growth it is not sufficient for water supply to Hyderabad city at present.Hussain Sagar Lake was built during the reign of the last Nizam of Hyderabad, Nizam VII and so it is named after his youngest son Himayat Ali Khan.. The grassy area adjoining the lake is an ideal picnic and recreation spot. The road atop the bund is popular for a good drive.Even now, large gatherings are seen on Week ends and public holidays. People from Hyderabad spend from morning till late evening and enjoy the spot which has cool breeze from the lake.Public transport is available from the city to reach the spot.

Name: subhanmirzabaig
Title: wonderful place in hyderabad
Review: its a wonderful place in hyderabad wher we can feel relax and confortable and awasome place good atmosphere
